sentences.en: ‘Why can’t I come?’ repeated Will with dogged persistence .
sentences.cn: “我为什么不能去？”威尔不死心地又问了一遍。

sentences.en: Another method of maintaining antigen persistence is through use of an adjuvant.
sentences.cn: 使用佐剂是保持抗原持续存留的另一方法.

sentences.en: At this he glanced at her quickly, in surprise at her persistence.
sentences.cn: 听到这话他飞快地瞥了她一眼, 对她的固执己见感到惊讶.

sentences.en: By sheer persistence, I eventually got her to change her mind.
sentences.cn: 我全凭坚持不懈最终使她改变了主意.

sentences.en: Chandra was determined to become a doctor and her persistence paid off.
sentences.cn: 钱德拉决心做一名医生，她的坚持不懈得到了回报。

sentences.en: He achieved success through dogged persistence.
sentences.cn: 他靠着坚持不懈取得了成功.

sentences.en: He showed similar adroitness and persistence in strategic arm control.
sentences.cn: 在战略武器方面,他显示出了同样的机敏和执著.

sentences.en: Her persistence paid off when she was offered the job of manager.
sentences.cn: 她得到了经理的职位，不懈坚持终于有了回报。
他的毅力使他获得了胜利.

sentences.en: His persistence was finally rewarded when the insurance company agreed to pay for the damage.
sentences.cn: 保险公司同意赔偿损失，他的坚持不懈终于得到了回报。

sentences.en: Nevertheless, I was shocked by the little worm's persistence.
sentences.cn: 然而小虫子的执着却震撼了我.

sentences.en: Persistence of the herbicide in the mud was irrespective of formulation.
sentences.cn: 除草剂在底泥中的持久性与剂型无关.

sentences.en: Pesticide persistence beyond the critical period for control leads to residue problems.
sentences.cn: 农药一旦超过控制的临界期,就会导致残留问题.

sentences.en: Plant cover has been observed to influence pesticide persistence.
sentences.cn: 人们观察到植物覆盖对农药持久性有影响.

sentences.en: Sandra was determined to become a doctor and her persistence paid off.
sentences.cn: 桑德拉决心成为医生，她的坚持取得了成功。

sentences.en: Someone who lacks staying power and persistence is unlikely to make a good researcher.
sentences.cn: 缺乏耐力和毅力的人不可能成为出色的研究员。

sentences.en: The persistence of this dead tissue furthers the injury.
sentences.cn: 这种坏死组织的持续存在使损伤加剧.

患持续言语症；表现固执

phrases.tran_cn: 视觉暂留；视觉残留；持续视觉

trans.tran_cn: 坚持不懈，执意，持续，留存，（荧光屏上余辉的）保留时间
trans.tran_en: determination to do something even though it is difficult or other people oppose it
